question.title: IMDb
question.content: Print the title and ratings of the movies released in 2012 whose metacritic rating is more than 60 and Domestic collections exceed 10 Crores. (Download the dataset from console)

rephrased.body: Extract and display the movie title and ratings for films released in 2012. The selection criteria are: a Metacritic rating exceeding 60 and domestic box office collections surpassing 10 Crores.

py.full_func:
'''
   Time Complexity: O(N*S)
   Space Complexity: O(N*S)

   Where N is the number of persons on the island and S is the total seating capacity of the plane.
'''
from typing import *

def escape(n: int, s: int, w: int, arrs: List[int], arrw: List[int])-> bool:
    
    dp = [[0 for i in range(s + 1)] for i in range(n + 1)]
    total = 0

    for i in range(1, n + 1):

        total += arrw[i - 1]
        for j in range(1, s + 1):

            # Calculating the dp transition states, where dp[i][j] represents 
            # the maximum weight that can be carried using i persons and j seating space
            dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j]

            if j >= arrs[i - 1]:
                dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j - arrs[i - 1]] +arrw[i - 1])
    
    for i in range(s + 1):
        # If the weight left is less than eqaul to w,
        # Return True
        if total - dp[n][i] <= w:
            return True
    
    return False
